about_the_game:
The Shattered is a fantasy roguelite dungeon crawler, where you decide the powers of your opponents. Overcome randomly generated challenges, create a unique set of skills, and uncover the mystery of your true identity.

You wake up in a prison suspended between realms, confronted with a series of challenges set by the owner of this place - the Creator. Overcoming the successive arenas will allow you to reclaim the shattered parts of your being, gradually restoring your power... and possibly your memory. However, these shattered fragments also empower your enemies and the mysterious, eerily familiar shadows.

In The Shattered, each playthrough is unique - challenges and their modifications are randomly generated, and you receive random sets of bonuses and items to enhance your character.

Traverse through different dimensions until you are worthy of meeting the creator of this place and discovering your destiny!

Key Features:

  • Dozens of arena levels with randomly selected scenarios from an ever-growing pool.

  • Multiple unique character classes, each with its own set of skills, talents, and items.

  • Dozens of enemy types, with powers you can choose.

  • 3 game modes: roguelite, roguelite+, roguelike.
